cause.description:
Each Year an average of 42,000 people in Canada are put behind bars because of birds like C*ris M*ller. If the world would stop feeding the birds, they would die off like they should be.
1. Birds eat well enough as it is Dont Feed Em.
2. Must stop the birds from taking over the world
3. Let the cops do their job, birds!
cause.name: Don't Feed the Birds
